name: Göbekli Tepe
description: Oldest known megalithic structure built by hunter-gatherers.

name: Mohenjo-Daro
description: Major city of the Indus Valley Civilization, featuring advanced urban planning.

name: Stonehenge
description: Famous prehistoric monument aligned with solstices.

name: Atlantis
description: Legendary lost city first described by Plato; debated existence.

name: Chichen Itza
description: Large Mayan city with astronomical pyramid aligned to equinoxes.

name: Yonaguni Monument
description: Underwater rock formation debated as natural or man-made.

name: Angkor Wat
description: World’s largest religious monument, originally a Hindu temple.

name: Teotihuacan
description: Mysterious ancient city with massive pyramids and unclear origins.

name: Valley of the Kings
description: Burial site of pharaohs including Tutankhamun.

name: Newgrange
description: Neolithic tomb aligned with the winter solstice sunrise.

name: Nabta Playa
description: Early African megalithic site with astronomical alignments.

name: Tikal
description: Powerful Mayan city-state with towering temples.

name: Ziggurat of Ur
description: Massive Sumerian temple to moon god Nanna.

name: Mount Kailash
description: Sacred peak believed to be the home of deities in several religions.

name: Great Zimbabwe
description: Ruins of a vast African city built by the Shona people.
